statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({7.46}+{5.84}\right)}={26.6}\approx{26.6}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.84}\cdot{6.65}={38.836}\approx{38.8}.
